answers.answer: Why are u being induced? I am being induced on the 5th july as baby not growing well...im so scared about being induced but excited too. Good luck I hope all goes well xx
i got induced with my son. very scary.
You can get induced if you have gestational diabetes, or if you're more than a week past your due date. Good luck! Happy baby meeting!

I'm 39+3 weeks, my blood pressure has been all over the place. So my doctor asked if I wanted to go ahead and get induced. My last pregnancy I had to be rushed to the hospital because my blood pressure got so highly it was causing the baby heart rate to drop so they induced me right then and there. I rather not risk it a second time around so baby girl is going to have to come out now!! I had ultrasound Wed just to make sure she was in good health and she 8lbs and ready to go.
Good luck and hope you have a safe labor and especially delivery!!

Aww congratulations! I hope u didnt mind my question I was just trying to find out if youwere in same boat as me ! Ill be 38 weeks when they induce so ill be full term but baby will be small they think so Im.worried about that! ....anyway good luck for ur induction I hope it all goes well and u have a.quick and safe delievry and a healthy baby!

No, I didn't mind. I hope all goes well with your little one. I hear it safer to deliver early if the baby is not growing well in the womb. Your baby may not be getting all the things it needs through the umbilical cord. Always better to be safe than sorry! Good luck!
Awe congrats and keep us posted on the delivery.

question: I'm officially 10 hours away from being induced! I'm so excited. This is my fourth and final baby girl. This pregnancy has had many ups and downs and I will miss it all. I want to thank all you wonderful ladies for your stories and questions and plan old rants it's helped make all the long nights and days a joy!  Hopefully before tomorrow is over I get to push my baby arrival button finally!!!!
title: Induction tonight!!!!
